Class TrackGenreDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.track.TrackGenreDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<TrackGenre>
public class TrackGenreDAO extends Object implements DAO<TrackGenre>
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing TrackGenre entities. Handles all CRUD operations for the TracksGenres association table in the database, which represents the many-to-many relationship between tracks and genres.

  • Constructor Summary
